themes: Traditional Indigenous arts and cultural relevance
Integration of healing practices in arts
Barriers to participation due to lack of external validation as artists
key_phrases: Traditional arts of people indigenous to these lands
opportunities that are culturally relevant and which include healing practices
interactive collective art opportunities which bring people together to make art
many people feel disconnected to art because they were not identified as artists in school or externally
making art should be practiced by more people who want to do it
provide these opportunities for ppl to explore this
barriers_identified: Many people feel disconnected to art because they were not identified as artists in school or externally
solutions_proposed: Provide opportunities for people to explore making art regardless of prior identification as artists
Support arts that are culturally relevant and include healing practices
